entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

Humidity: 61 %

Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
